import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Noter un exercice"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/exercises/{id}/rate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permet à l'utilisateur de noter un exercice de 1 à 5 étoiles

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Identifiant unique de l'exercice à noter","schema":{"example":"clh123456789","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"rating":{"type":"number","description":"Note de 1 à 5 étoiles","example":4,"minimum":1,"maximum":5},"comment":{"type":"string","description":"Commentaire optionnel sur l'exercice","example":"Excellent exercice pour le renforcement des jambes !"}},"required":["rating"],"title":"RateExerciseDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Exercice noté avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"rating":{"description":"Évaluation créée ou mise à jour","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Identifiant de l'évaluation","example":"rat_123456789"},"rating":{"type":"number","description":"Note de 1 à 5 étoiles","example":4},"comment":{"type":"string","description":"Commentaire sur l'exercice","example":"Excellent exercice pour le renforcement des jambes !"},"createdAt":{"type":"string","description":"Date de création de l'évaluation","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","description":"Date de dernière modification","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"}},"required":["id","rating","createdAt","updatedAt"],"title":"ExerciseRatingDto"}]},"isNewRating":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indique si c'est une nouvelle évaluation ou une mise à jour","example":true},"newAverageRating":{"type":"number","description":"Nouvelle note moyenne de l'exercice","example":4.3}},"required":["rating","isNewRating","newAverageRating"],"title":"RateExerciseResponseDto"}}}},"400":{"description":"Données de notation invalides"},"401":{"description":"Non autorisé - token JWT requis"},"404":{"description":"Exercice non trouvé"}}}
 id="exercise-controller-rate-exercise-responses">
  
</StatusCodes>
